name: scallopbot
description: An economical and smart bot architecture

scripts.build:web: cd web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:web && rm -rf dist && tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');function cpDir(s,t){fs.mkdirSync(t,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(s,{withFileTypes:true}).forEach(e=>{const sp=p.join(s,e.name),tp=p.join(t,e.name);e.isDirectory()?cpDir(sp,tp):fs.copyFileSync(sp,tp)})}fs.readdirSync('src/skills/bundled').forEach(d=>{const s=p.join('src/skills/bundled',d),t=p.join('dist/skills/bundled',d);if(fs.existsSync(p.join(s,'SKILL.md')))cpDir(s,t)})"
